# Update GitHub

</br>

## Update your Nightscout fork

```{tab-set}

:::{tab-item} Heroku Railway Northflank Render
</br>You need to update your GitHub repository.
</br>
:::{include} /vendors/github/update_b.md
</br>
:::

:::{tab-item} Fly.io
</br>If you're using Fly.io with the original cgm-remote-monitor repository you don't need to update in GitHub.</br></br>
Else you need to update your GitHub repository.</br></br>
:::{include} /vendors/github/update_b.md
</br>
:::

:::{tab-item} Azure, Google Cloud
</br>You don't need to update your GitHub repository.</br></br>
:::

```

</br>
